headline: Warren Buffett explains why he 'shut up' on politically charged issues
author: Daniel Howley
sentences:
And on certain subjects, they will take it out on our companies.?
CEOs have increasingly stepped up their efforts to support social causes, whether its Apple CEO Tim Cook and his outspoken support of civil rights, or Disney and its belated fight against Floridas so-called Dont Say Gay? bill.

And sometimes they will be so upset about us that they will try andhave campaigns against our companies.?
Buffett has long spoken on topics ranging from economic inequality to health care, but the CEO says hes moving further away from discussing controversial topics.
Ron DeSantis is striking back at Disney by pushing the states legislature to repeal the entertainment giants special tax status that allows it to operate as its own kind of government.
But at this years gathering, the CEO explained why hes not speaking on politically charged topics  because doing so could affect Berkshire and the companies it invests in.
Warren Buffett is famous for pontificating on everything from the business world to nuclear war during Berkshire Hathaways (BRK-A, BRK-B) annual shareholders meeting.
I don't want to say anything that will get attributed basically to Berkshire, and have somebody else bear the consequences of what I talk about,? Buffett said.
The best thing to do is to basically shut up and not have a bunch of people facing consequences that they didn't ask for in the first place,? he added.
But I've also learned that you can make a whole lot more people sustainably mad than you can make temporarily happy by speaking on any subject.
For his part, Buffett says that he is treading more carefully when it comes to speaking out about politically charged issues.
Why in the world do I want to hurt the people in that other room that do all kinds of things for Berkshire?
I don't put my citizenship in a blind trust when I take the job as CEO of Berkshire,? Buffett said.
Because I say something that 20% of the country is going to instantly disagree with.
While Apple hasnt faced much backlash for supporting such efforts, Floridas Gov.
Why do I want to hurt you?
